series.title: Radical Candor
series.author: Kim Scott and Russ Laraway / Onward Project / Panoply

episodes.title: Ep. 9: Showing Appreciation Makes Work More Fun
episodes.author: Kim Scott and Russ Laraway / Onward Project / Panoply
episodes.summary: In honor of Employee Appreciation Day, this Friday, March 3rd, Russ and Kim talk about cultivating a sense of appreciation within your team. They explain why many bosses aren’t great at this and share some tips for showing appreciation this week!

episodes.title: Ep. 8: How to Give Feedback to Your Boss
episodes.author: Kim Scott and Russ Laraway / Onward Project / Panoply
episodes.summary: Being able to give your boss feedback is one of the key ways not to hate the boss you have! But this can be extremely daunting and sometimes risky…how do you do it so that you’ll be heard and not shut down?

episodes.title: Ep. 7: How to Get Feedback from Your Boss
episodes.author: Kim Scott and Russ Laraway / Onward Project / Panoply
episodes.summary: Feedback is critical for success, so what happens if you aren’t getting the feedback you need? It can feel hard to ask for feedback, especially from your boss, but Russ and Kim have some advice! This episode is all about how to get feedback from your boss.

episodes.title: Ep. 6: Telling People What to Do Doesn't Work
episodes.author: Kim Scott and Russ Laraway / Onward Project / Panoply
episodes.summary: One of the most common mistakes bosses make is thinking their job is to tell people what to do. But that doesn’t work! So how can you get people moving in the same direction and achieving results collaboratively? Listen to this week’s episode for tips from Russ and Kim about how NOT to tell people what to do.

episodes.title: Ep. 5: Career Conversations
episodes.author: Kim Scott and Russ Laraway / Onward Project / Panoply
episodes.summary: As a manager, your job is to help your people grow. But have you ever asked yourself, “Grow into what?” This week, Russ and Kim talk about a technique for getting to know the people on your team, understanding the things that motivate them, learning about their dreams, and helping them make tangible progress towards those dreams.

episodes.title: Ep. 4: Ruinous Empathy and Criticism
episodes.author: Kim Scott and Russ Laraway / Onward Project / Panoply
episodes.summary: Giving criticism isn't usually something that people look forward to, but it needs to be done! If you don't give criticism when it's needed, you end up hurting people you care about by being "too nice." Kim and Russ both share stories about learning this the hard way, and some tips to help you avoid Ruinous Empathy.

episodes.title: Ep. 3: Ruinous Empathy and Praise
episodes.author: Kim Scott and Russ Laraway / Onward Project / Panoply
episodes.summary: Have you ever received praise that made it feel like you were just getting a pat on the head? Or have you ever given someone praise because you wanted them to like you? This episode is for you! This week on the Radical Candor podcast: Ruinous Empathy and praise, with special guest, Dick Costolo!

episodes.title: Ep. 2: Radically Candid Criticism
episodes.author: Kim Scott and Russ Laraway / Onward Project / Panoply
episodes.summary: Radical Candor Episode 2 is here! In this week’s episode, Russ and Kim talk about Radically Candid criticism. What is it and why does it work? They share stories about times they screwed up and then received Radically Candid criticism. Russ and Kim also give concrete tips for offering Radically Candid criticism in your own workplace.

episodes.title: Ep. 1: What is Radical Candor?
episodes.author: Kim Scott and Russ Laraway / Onward Project / Panoply
episodes.summary: Our first podcast episode is available now! This week Kim and Russ introduce the ideas behind Radical Candor, tell how they learned these lessons the hard way, and share practical tips for better relationships at work.

episodes.title: Coming Soon: Radical Candor
episodes.author: Kim Scott and Russ Laraway / Onward Project / Panoply
episodes.summary: A weekly podcast debuting January 2, 2017 with The Onward Project.  Subscribe now to ensure you get the episodes as soon as they are available!
